title: Resolve for memorializing the Massachusetts Delegation, and the United States Congress, on the need for official, and general support of a Federal ERA, and public education, regarding this subject

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Lewis (by request), a petition (accompanied by resolve, Senate, No. 2476) of Vincent Dixon,  for legislation to memorialize the Massachusetts Delegation, and the United States Congress, on the need for official, and general support of a Federal ERA, and public education, regarding this subject.  Veterans and Federal Affairs.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

related_entities.name: committee on Veterans and Federal Affairs

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 11/13/2025 from 01:00 PM-03:50 PM in B-1                                             and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Accompanied a study order, see S2784
